summary:
This mod will add a Navi fairy as your follower from the game The Legend Of Zelda.
she will not take your follower slot so you can always hire a extra follower.
descriptionHtml:
===========
Navi Fairy
============


Description
============
This mod will add a Navi fairy as your follower from the game The Legend Of Zelda.

she will not take your follower slot so you can always hire a extra follower.

You can ask her to do job for yourself and also share your inventory with her.

You can find a summon navi Spelltome to summon her under the  Gildergreen tree in Whiterun.

Once you learn the summon navi spell use it to either summon or banish her.

The Summon Navi spell is under conjuration section.

She is leveled with player.

she have fully customized voices such as Hey Listen.

Change log
===========
Version 1.21
Added SEQ file to avoid dialogue bug.
Added Light foot Perk to avoid traps
========================
Version 1.2
Added Blue Butterfly Wings to Navi.
Fixed some dialogue errors



=============
Installation
=============

Extract the archieve, Put data folder in your skyrim folder

==========

==========
Credits
==========
Bethasda Softworks for making skyrim.
Nintendo for The legend of Zelda.

==================================================================================

If You like the mod don\'t forget to endorse.
==================================================================================

Thank You
==========

Thanks for Preykousis for Video

[youtube]1FT1KTp3rhw[/youtube]
author: Praveen
